'''Halliburton Energy Services''' ({{nyse|HAL}}) is a [[multinational corporation]] with operations in over 120 countries, and is based in [[Houston, Texas]]. Halliburton operates two major business segments: The Energy Services Group provides technical products and services for [[oil]] and [[gas]] exploration and production, and their [[Kellogg, Brown and Root|KBR]] subsidiary is a major construction company of [[Oil refinery | refineries]], [[oil fields]], [[Pipeline transport | pipelines]], and [[chemical plant]]s. Their [[2005]] [[revenue]]s were $20.99 billion [[United States dollar|USD]] and they employ over 106,000 people worldwide.
+
'''Halliburton Energy Services''' ({{nyse|HAL}}) is a [[multinational corporation]] with operations in over 120 countries, and is based in [[Houston, Texas]]. Halliburton operates two major business segments: The Energy Services Group provides technical products and services for [[oil]] and [[Natural gas|gas]] exploration and production, and their [[Kellogg, Brown and Root|KBR]] subsidiary is a major construction company of [[Oil refinery | refineries]], [[oil fields]], [[Pipeline transport | pipelines]], and [[chemical plant]]s. Their [[2005]] [[revenue]]s were $20.99 billion [[United States dollar|USD]] and they employ over 106,000 people worldwide.
